description:
Large studio apartment in historic home.  Private entrance with easy access to public transportation. Free ferry ride to Manhattan 15 minutes away.   Queen bed, full kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and basic kitchen essentials. In historic neighborhood thathas great restaurants and cafes all within walking distance of the home.

Great location to explore NYC and experience local culture.

Guest will have access to the backyard patio,  and basketball hoop.

We respect any guests privacy, however any guests who want to talk and learn more about local culture we are happy to share.

The beautiful historic homes are by far the best feature of our neighborhood. The local restaurants and cafes are amazing as well.

There is plenty of free street parking available.

Bus line (S78) stops right in front of the house.   Staten Island Ferry is 20 minute walk or short bus ride away.

Airport pickup and drop off is available upon advance notice for great prices. Prices vary depending on airport and time of day for arrival. Contact us if you are interested.
name: Charming Studio In Historic Home
review: Very friendly, and kind! Great service, beautiful apartment, and quiet neighborhood!
